ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.2_0: the nuns from the group of six were traveling in vehicles.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.3_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.4_0: “How can the nuns travel in a vehicle? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.5_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six travel in a vehicle?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.11_0: “... How can the nuns from the group of six do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.15_0: In this way the Buddha has laid down a training rule for the nuns.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.1_0: Soon afterwards there was a sick nun who was not able to travel on foot. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.2_0: They told the Buddha. He then had the Sangha gathered and addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.3_0: “Monks, I allow a sick nun to use a vehicle.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.4_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.5.1_0: ‘If a nun who is not sick travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.6_0: who is able to travel on foot.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.8_0: who is unable to travel on foot.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.10_0: a wagon, a carriage, a cart, a chariot.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.12_0: if she travels in a vehicle even once, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.1_0: If she is not sick, and she does not perceive herself as sick, and she travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.2_0: If she is not sick, but she is unsure of it, and she travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.3_0: If she is not sick, but she perceives herself as sick, and she travels in a vehicle, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.4_0: If she is sick, but she perceives herself as sick, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.5_0: If she is sick, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.6_0: If she is sick, and she perceives herself as sick, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.3.3_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.3.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.3.6_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
